title: Problems with Gingerbread Ward Skin??
body: Idk if this is a problem but recently, i noticed that my gingerbread ward skin disappeared. I bought the skin when it was on sale during christmas so figured that it would be there right?

replies.body:
There's a known issue with displaying specific ward skins, this being one of them. It's still on your account, it just won't show up in your collections or in champ select. We're working on a fix, but I don't have a timeline on when that will roll out.

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
